alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Crazy Mountains; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Northern Park; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 9:58PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS WITH STRONG WINDS WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN WHEATLAND... NORTHWESTERN SWEET GRASS AND NORTH CENTRAL PARK COUNTIES THROUGH 1045 PM MDT... At 957 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 25 miles north of Clyde Park to 14 miles south of Livingston. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Travel on interstate 90 from Livingston to Big Timber, and highway 191 from Big Timber to Melville, will be impacted by sudden cross winds. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Big Timber, Springdale, Twodot, Melville, and Mc Leod. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
